title: Team Project Kickoff â€“ Differing Opinions Emerge
content: While leading a cross-functional team on a product launch, a disagreement arose between marketing and engineering over feature prioritization and timeline expectations.

title: Tension and Misalignment
content: The misalignment created tension during team meetings, slowing down progress and risking the overall launch timeline. Team members began working in silos, further weakening collaboration.

title: Facilitating Constructive Dialogue
content: I organized a focused alignment session where each team presented their concerns and constraints. Using a neutral facilitation approach, I guided the group toward shared priorities and clarified non-negotiables from both sides.

title: Agreement and Unified Direction
content: The session resulted in a revised project roadmap that addressed core concerns from both teams. Collaboration improved significantly, and we hit all critical deadlines with high team morale.

title: Key Takeaway: Collaborative Conflict Resolution
content: By encouraging open communication and focusing on shared goals, I helped transform conflict into a productive outcome. This experience reinforced my belief in empathy and structure as tools for resolving team disagreements.
